title: The Panda Edition
description:
This week, Slate Money talks about Trump’s trade wars with China and Mexico, the
Fiat/Chrysler Renault merger and MacKenzie Bezos’ giving pledge.
Email: slatemoney@slate.com
Twitter: @felixsalmon, @Three_Guineas, @EmilyRPeck
Podcast production by Jessamine Molli.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
